message: I propose a fair, if not generous, split. You get 10% and I get 90%.  Let's finish this quickly, as the money will be worth less in every round!
I'll take a bit more, but I'm still willing to compromise. Your turn to decide!
Let's find a middle ground. I'm willing to come down to 60%, but I'm not going lower.  The money is losing value quickly, and I don't want to risk getting nothing.
I'll meet you halfway, but I think I deserve a bit more for my patience and risk of getting nothing. Your turn to decide!
